text:
He is also rumored to expose (if he does write this juicy memoir) Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's "volatile marriage."

According to the "insider," Scott knows all about Kim’s "outrageous diva demands" and “how she and Kanye lead separate lives.”

Another source told In Touch, Scott "knows [the truth] about Kanye’s mental health."

More from CafeMom: Scott Disick Spent the Holiday Weekend Traveling With His Son Mason
title: Scott Disick Is Reportedly Considering Writing a Kardashian Tell-All for $10 Million

meta_data.description: Would Scott Disick really betray the Kardashians for a hefty paycheck?
